title: How to Turn Off the Narrator in Minecraft: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Go to the main menu.
steps.content: Go to the main menu. This is the menu that displays when you start Minecraft . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . This will open the Accessibility Menu by default.

steps.title: Turn off the “Text To Speech for UI” option.
steps.content: Turn off the “Text To Speech for UI” option. This will turn off the narrator. Now you’re ready to continue on your journey to find the End Portal (or just make a cool house ).

steps.title: Press Ctrl+B.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + B . This will open the narrator settings in Minecraft. You can turn off the narrator completely, or set it to only read certain texts in the game. [2] X Research source Next, check out how to change your Minecraft skin .

steps.title: Press ⊞ Win+Ctrl+N.
steps.content: Press ⊞ Win + Ctrl + N . This will open the Narrator settings for Windows. Here, you can toggle off the Windows Narrator feature. Now you’re ready to keep exploring or play a custom map . [3] X Research source
